key_features: 10% Cashback on Beauty & Wellness, Online Shopping, Groceries, Pet Shops & Veterniary Services, Cruises
To qualify for the 10% cashback, you must spend at least S$800, posted in the same statement month.
Complimentary Travel Insurance up to S$500,000
Apply for up to 4 supplementary cards and have annual fees waived for all supplementary cards
Access to over 1,000 regional deals with discounts up to 50%

At MoneySmart, we strive to keep our information accurate and up to date. This information may be different from what you see when you visit a financial institution, service provider, or specific product site. MoneySmart shall not be liable to compensate the Customer should the information is not as updated as our Partner.
overseas_spending: Visa Signature Concierge - Premium service that gives you access to world class service and privileges. From travel reservations, booking tickets of a show to dinner reservations
Complimentary travel insurance - Get covered up to S$500,000 for you and your family
cash_back: 10% Cash Back on Pet Shops & Veterinary Services
To qualify for the 10% cashback, you must spend at least S$800, posted in the same statement month.
The 10% cashback is capped at S$100 per statement month per Principal Cardmember, and up to S$20 per category.
10% Cash back consists of the base Cash Back of 0.2% and an additional 9.8%
For spend beyond the cap, you will earn 0.2% cashback.
dining: For updated deals, kindly visit https://deals.cimb.com/sg/dining
installment: With CIMB 0% i.Pay Plan (IPP) enjoy 0% interest instalment payments from 3 to 24 months
A one time processing fee of 3% of transaction amount for 3 or 6 months, and 5% for 12 months tenure, 6% for 24 months tenure
Earn cash rebates on instalment payment plan and save on your daily expenses.
Minimum of S$300 and maximum of S$30K can be converted per transaction.

eligibility: Applicable for New-to-CIMB card holders only
Customers need to apply through MoneySmart to be eligible
Log into your MoneySmart account and submit your claim by 30th April 2025

fees.cash_advance_fee: 8% of the amount withdrawn (minimum charge of S$15).
fees.overlimit_fee: S$50 or 5% of the excess amount, whichever is higher
